originalText.text:
Dr. Kamelhar is great and I would highly recommend!

Dr. Kamelhar is extremely thorough in his examination and takes the time explaining his findings/impression. His office is very well managed.. reception answers their phones, they have very reasonable appointment wait times, and the office is clean.

Dr. Kamelhar is great and I would highly recommend!

Dr. Kamelhar is extremely thorough in his examination and takes the time explaining his findings/impression. His office is very well managed.. reception answers their phones, they have very reasonable appointment wait times, and the office is clean.

originalText.text: Dr. Kamelhar is an excellent doctor with years of experience.  I would highly recommend him.  I believe there is much needed improvement when it comes to his staff concerning follow up and returning calls.  You are hard pressed to get a live personal after going through the automated system.  I left two messages plus a website message and I waited for two weeks for a return call for an appointment.  They finally called on Oct. 11.  I missed the call and called back the same day a few minutes before 5pm and the out going message indicated the office was closed.  I left a message on Oct. 12, on Oct. 13, plus a website message and I have yet to receive a call back.  I understand they may be swamped and I accept there is a possibility I might have an appointment later down the line due to the high volume, but it's unacceptable to receive a follow up call two weeks or more for an appointment request in any line of business much less the medical profession where timeliness is vital.

originalText.text: Doctor Kamelhar is a godsend. I began seeing him two months ago and my initial impressions are all positive regarding him and his staff. Doctor Jamelhar recommended that I continue with the medications that were helping me, while discontinuing some medications prescribed by other doctors. This was the first time I became aware of the process of gradually stopping a medication, even if it was effective. He gradually reduced the dosage until I eventually stopped it altogether. Instead of prescribing new medication, he advised me to explore natural methods to manage my allergies, such as using a humidifier. I couldn't be happier with his care. It's evident that he possesses comprehensive knowledge, extending beyond his own field. His genuine and caring personality is a rare find in a doctor.
